actions.text: Amendment SA 1669 as modified agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

Amendment SA 1669 proposed by Senator Reid for Senator Murray. (consideration:  CR S11539-11544) To authorize the Secretary of the Army to carry out a joint project with Asotin County, Washington, to construct a Snake River Confluence Interpretative Center near Clarkston, Washington.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1669 proposed by Senator Reid for Senator Murray.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1669 as modified agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

purpose: To authorize the Secretary of the Army to carry out a joint project with Asotin County, Washington, to construct a Snake River Confluence Interpretative Center near Clarkston, Washington.
